name: SnowBoarder- Project
description:
Working through GamDev.tv's projects and getting my feet wet with coding and building games in Unity. 

https://www.gamedev.tv/p/unity-2d-game-dev-course-2021/?coupon_code=AUTUMN

This is a downhill snowboarding game where your objective is to make it to the end without crashing

left and right arrows control the players spin

up arrow gives you a speed boost

Enjoy! :)
